exercises.name: Bench Press (Barbell)
exercises.instructions: Lie on a flat bench, grip the barbell with hands slightly wider than shoulder width. Lower the bar to your chest, then press back up to starting position.

exercises.name: Deadlift
exercises.instructions: Stand with feet hip-width apart, bend down and grip the barbell. Keep back straight, chest up, and pull the weight up by extending hips and knees.

exercises.name: Squat (Barbell)
exercises.instructions: Place barbell on upper back, feet shoulder-width apart. Bend knees and hips to lower until thighs are parallel to ground, then return to standing.

exercises.name: Overhead Press
exercises.instructions: Stand with barbell at shoulder height, press the weight overhead until arms are fully extended.

exercises.name: Pull Up
exercises.instructions: Hang from pull-up bar with hands wider than shoulder width, pull yourself up until chin clears the bar.

exercises.name: Dumbbell Row
exercises.instructions: Place one knee and hand on bench, other foot on ground. Pull dumbbell to hip level, keeping elbow close to body.

exercises.name: Incline Bench Press (Dumbbell)
exercises.instructions: Lie on an incline bench, press dumbbells from shoulder level until arms are extended.

exercises.name: Romanian Deadlift
exercises.instructions: Hold barbell in front of thighs, hinge at hips while keeping legs relatively straight, lower weight along thighs.

exercises.name: Lateral Raise
exercises.instructions: Stand holding dumbbells at sides, raise arms out to sides until parallel with ground.

exercises.name: Tricep Pushdown
exercises.instructions: Using cable machine, push handle down from chest height until arms are fully extended.

exercises.name: Bicep Curl (Barbell)
exercises.instructions: Stand holding barbell with underhand grip, curl weight up to shoulder level while keeping upper arms still.

exercises.name: Leg Press
exercises.instructions: Sit in leg press machine, push platform away by extending knees and hips.

exercises.name: Face Pull
exercises.instructions: Using rope attachment on cable machine, pull towards face while keeping upper arms parallel to ground.

exercises.name: Dips
exercises.instructions: Support body on dip bars, lower until upper arms are parallel to ground, then push back up.

exercises.name: Leg Extension
exercises.instructions: Sit in leg extension machine, extend knees to raise weight until legs are straight.
